M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.ning.breakout.StartGame
The main method to run the program.
MainMenuController - Class in com.ning.breakout.controller
The controller class of the main menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the main menu.
MainMenuController(MediaPlayer, MediaPlayer, StartGame) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.controller.MainMenuController
The class constructor specifies the MediaPlayers to play the welcome music and the sound for clicking button, and sets the StartGame instance of the main menu controller to switches scenes.
makeBackground() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardFactory
Returns the Image object used as the background image of the game board for a specific color theme.
makeBallView() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardFactory
Returns the Image object used as the source of the view of the ball for a specific color theme.
makeBrickView(Brick) - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardFactory
Returns the Image object used as the source of the view of the specified type of brick for a specific color theme.
makeLevel(int, Rectangle) - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.BrickFactory
Makes bricks of specified level for the game.
makePaddleView() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardFactory
Returns the Image object used as the source of the view of the paddle for a specific color theme.
Movable - Interface in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
Graphics class implements Interface Movable should be able to move in the game board.
move() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Moves the ball and the paddle by their speed.
move() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
Moves the ball by speed and updates the layout of ball's view.
move() - Method in interface com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Movable
Moves graphics by speed.
move() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Paddle
Moves the paddle by speed and updates the layout of paddle's view.
moveLeft() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Paddle
Sets the moving direction of the paddle to left, with default movement amount.
moveRight() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Paddle
Sets the moving direction of the paddle to right, with default movement amount.
moveTo(Point2D) - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
Moves the ball to specified position and updates the layout of ball's view.
moveTo(Point2D) - Method in interface com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Movable
Moves graphics to specified point.
moveTo(Point2D) - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Paddle
Moves the paddle to specified position and updates the layout of paddle's view.
muteWelcomeMusic() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.MainMenuController
Mutes the welcome music when the music icon clicked.
